summary: Tired of skyrim being extreamly bright, and want colors that pop, well try this out for size
descriptionHtml:
Mutes Ancient Retexture mod v1.3
=================================================
Info
-------------------------------------------------
This Retexture overhaul is so that if you dont like how \"Bright the game is\" this will make it darker,
The main goal of this mod is 
1) to enhance the features and looks of items all around skyrim
2) Darken the world up
3) Be warrned just adding Stocks textures to the data folder will not overide this mod
4) If you wish for a compatability mod drop me a message on the nexus
5) if makeing a mod and you wish to use these textures thats easy just do not load this mod when you make yours, and when
the mod comes out make sure to load this mod last to reduce conflicts
6) Please inform me of all Odd looking textures, drop me a message on the Nexus where this file is, when you drop it in ill let
you know when i have fixed it
7) Any Problems or bugs just hit me a message
========================================
Side notes*************
I will not change the following with this mod
1) Weapons- To many weapon mods
2) Clothes- To many clothes mods
3) Skin- same as above
------------When i finish with this mod i \"MAY\" Make a mod for the above, but right now this is mostly for just items that you can not pick up

======================
Next to be done
======================
Change over all the rest of whiterun, this includes but not limited to Interior, Exterior, and all else

---------------------------
Completed Versions and what they include
---------------------------
v1.3
---------------------------
Whiterun Buildings external complete!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

v1.2
---------------------------
some of the whiterun exterior is complete,mainly
-marketstalls
-breezehome (exterior,normal and lod)
-Doors (Exterior, some not all)
-Castle main(exterior, normal and lod)
-castle enterance(Exterior, normal and lod)
v1.1
---------------------------
All Cliffs Done
Most terain Done

v1.0
--------------------------
Major Update, now most of the ground you walk along is complete

v0.5
--------------------------
Completed more than in the versions before

v0.2
------------
1) Few more items done, along with the same nif files

v0.1
------------
1) Few Textures added into game for list read the Changelog.txt
2) Packed Into Bsa file

------------
Install
put MutesRetexture.esp and bsa into your data folder then makes sure they are enabled

Uninstall
==============================================================
you can either just deactivate this mod or you can delete the esp and bsa files


Side information
==============================================================
Looking for someone to help me turn this into a high resolution mod as well, please message me here

=========================================
Permissions
----------------------------------------
You are not allowed to edit or modify or post in other places without my consent

Credits
=========================================
Niftools team
bethesda
Gimp Team
author: muteday
